## Beck Anxiety Inventory vs GHQ-28

Harmonising the elements of various psychological questionnaires can be challenging and time-consuming. However, for psychologists interested in comparing the Beck Anxiety Inventory to the GHQ-28, Harmony is here to help streamline the process. Harmony is an innovative software tool that utilises natural language processing and generative AI models, making the task of comparing Beck Anxiety Inventory and GHQ-28 less complex and more efficient.
